openai_api.description: OpenAI GPT-4o API - PRIMARY for all analysis: document identification, image/video analysis, geolocation, object detection, context analysis

google_gemini_api.description: Google Gemini API - FALLBACK for AI services (OpenAI is PRIMARY)

google_maps_api.description: Google Maps API - FALLBACK for geocoding and reverse geocoding (OpenAI is PRIMARY)

bing_search_api.description: Bing Search API for OSINT and web search

public_records_api.description: Public Records API for background checks
